name: Magic Meter
description:
Magic Meter was written for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 where the theme was “Less is More”. The game interprets the theme as less inputs, less play time, but more effects and adrenaline.

Controls: SPACEBAR

Hold SPACEBAR to summon magical power. The longer you hold the SPACEBAR the wider and stronger your attack. But don’t hold it too long; you’re being attacked by a swarm of evil forest spirits.

How long can you last?
